dashboard.motivation: To build a fulfilling life without dependencies
dashboard.goals: Achieve a stable job and reconnect with family
dashboard.consequencesOfAccomplishing: Sense of freedom and improved relationships
dashboard.consequencesOfNotAccomplishing: Risk of relapse and strained family ties

recoveryToolbox.occupational: Seek opportunities for skill development in chosen career
recoveryToolbox.financial: Build an emergency fund covering three months of expenses
recoveryToolbox.intellectual: Read a new book monthly to expand knowledge
recoveryToolbox.emotional: Practice mindfulness to reduce stress and manage emotions
recoveryToolbox.social: Reconnect with friends and family weekly
recoveryToolbox.spiritual: Meditate daily for 10 minutes to stay centered
recoveryToolbox.environmental: Maintain a clean and organized living space

social.response: Plan to engage in sober activities with different friends

places.response: Avoid these places initially; attend events with a support group

things.response: Politely avoid gatherings with alcohol initially

feelings.response: Practice mindfulness and reach out to support network when feeling down

financial.response: Keep a small emergency fund for unexpected expenses

spiritual.response: Reconnect with spiritual practices to find purpose

environmental.response: Establish a cleaning routine for a peaceful environment

intellectualOccupational.response: Prioritize tasks and take breaks when needed
